response.overview: Ruva and Fro are illegal Zimbabwean immigrants in South Africa. They work as rubbish sorters with the hope of one day returning to Zimbabwe and building a future for themselves there. On one of their routes, they come across an old, abandoned pondok, but they soon realize that it is no ordinary pondok: it can teleport them to anywhere on earth. They see a gap and use the pondok to transport people illegally to and from South Africa for a fee. However, Ruva's greed for money and ambition are causing life-threatening difficulties for him and his family.
response.title: Four Walls and a Roof
